doc:
Christopher Stanley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_Stanley 0 Christopher Stanley (born December 1965) is an American film and television actor, best known for his role as the politician Henry Francis, the second husband of Betty Francis played by January Jones on Mad Men. After a recurring role in the third and fourth seasons, he is a main cast member in the fifth, sixth and seventh seasons. He appeared in the Ben Affleck-directed film Argo. Christopher_Stanley ( born December_1965 ) is an_American_film_and_television_actor , best_known for his_role as the_politician_Henry_Francis , the_second_husband of Betty_Francis played by January_Jones on Mad_Men . After a_recurring_role in the_third_and_fourth_seasons , he is a_main_cast_member in the_fifth_,_sixth_and_seventh_seasons . He appeared in the_Ben_Affleck-directed_film_Argo .
